mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberId, memberPassword, memberName,memberAge,memberSecurity, memberSecurity1,memberEmail, memberMobile, memberProfileName, memberAddress1, memberAddress2, memberAddress3) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberSecurity}, #{memberSecurity1},#{memberEmail},#{memberMobile}, #{memberProfileName}, #{memberAddress1}, #{memberAddress2},#{memberAddress3})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
